subject: Consulate Embassy Of Nigeria
body:
Consulate Embassy Of Nigeria,
Nigerian House,NY
828 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10017, USA
Tel:1 212-800-0303.
               Nigeria Embassy NY Mailing Of Your ATM Visa Card.
Attn: ATM Card Owner Beneficiary.
Sir/Madam.
With utmost urgency,you are requested  to contact my desk and office at the Nigerian Embassy here in NY,United States for the onward mailing of your First Bank Nigeria Plc ATM Gold Master Card,your ATM Card parcel was sent to our embassy here through the US Embassy in Nigeria for onward delivery to you the owner,the idea behind sending from the Nigerian Embassy here in NY is to make it easy for your reach and collections as is coming from our Embassy,the value as uploaded in your First Bank ATM Card is the sum of USD1.5 Million Only as approved by the US Government through the United States Embassy and the Nigerian Government through the Nigerian Embassy here in NY.
Furthermore note that your mailing from our Embassy here in NY is at the cost of the Nigerian Embassy no matter your country,region or state as the Nigerian Embassy will shoulder the mailing fees free of charge until it gets to your doorstep,the only obligations from you the card owner is to Pay/Send the ATM CARD FUNDS LOADING CHARGES to First Bank Nigeria Plc as that is the fees you will send to them directly to the bank in Nigeria through Nigerian Embassy here in NY,United States...NOTE..Your First Bank ATM Card is already Activated and your Card Pin Numbers ready as well,so for security reasons the valued sum uploaded will be loaded from First Bank in Nigeria to avert impersonations after you have sent the ATM CARD FUNDS LOADING CHARGES  to the bank in Nigeria ,so send to me your mailing address,country,telephone number and full names as well as the bank in Nigeria needs them to Load your funds in your ATM Card account with them,your email was chosen by the both embassies through random balloting and as a beneficiary as well.
Finally i will inform you how to send the  ATM CARD FUNDS LOADING CHARGES fees to FIRST BANK NIGERIA PLC and the amount as well to send to them,once you have done that,i will proceed with your mailing FOC at the Embassy cost without you paying a dime anymore. 
Sincerely Yours.
Gen.Godwin Abe Rtd.
Defense Attachee.
Nigerian Embassy,NY,USA.

subject: Re:   Consulate Embassy Of Nigeria
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the First Bank Nigeria Plc ATM Gold Master ATM Card parcel. It's interesting to hear that it was sent to the Nigerian Embassy in New York through the US Embassy in Nigeria for onward delivery.

Could you please provide more details about how I can send the ATM CARD FUNDS LOADING CHARGES to First Bank Nigeria Plc? I would like to ensure that I follow the correct procedure and make sure everything is done securely.

Also, could you clarify what exactly the ATM CARD FUNDS LOADING CHARGES are for? I want to make sure I understand all the fees involved before proceeding.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Ernie
